## Role interface

Represent a group of principals that have the same authority. There are two types of roles:

- explicit - implicit

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Role 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [name](./authorization.role.name.md) | <code>string</code> | Name/id |
